alert.note: Alert for Delaware Beaches; Inland Sussex (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 15 at 12:57PM EDT until October 15 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near bay shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Back bays and tidal waterways in Sussex County, including the Delaware Beaches. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional rounds of minor flooding are forecast, particularly with the Monday morning high tide. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Delaware Bay at Lewes MLLW Categories - Minor 6.0 ft, Moderate 7.0 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 15/10 PM 5.8 1.2 1.6 None 16/10 AM 6.3 1.7 1.4 Minor 16/11 PM 5.2 0.5 1.2 None 17/11 AM 6.2 1.5 1.2 Minor 17/11 PM 4.9 0.2 1.1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
